system.description: “For when you don’t have time to be subtle… or alive.” Once per Scene, when you trigger an ICE countermeasure or trace feature, you can Mark 1 Stress to use your Reaction against the Device difficulty to avoid the effect, or Mark 2 Stress to avoid it without a roll.
